attributes.action: Put pressure on the Pakistani Government to protect minority Christians from extremists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned in the UK are extremely concerned to hear that the tiny Christian minority in North West Pakistan are receiving anonymous threats by Islamic militants of bomb attacks if they do not become Muslims.
We appeal to the British Government to put as much pressure as possible diplomatically on the Pakistani Government for it to provide adequate protection for all its minority religions and to take these threats seriously.
